page.title: 14Social Concerns
page.content: The nearest{social services } department is in Williton. A{home-help service for elderly or sick is administered from there. Two ladies will do house-work, shopping etc. A {meals-on-wheels}service operates in cases of need. At present all the elderly in the village are independent and look after themselves. A weekly {mini-bus service}travelling through the local vilages calls to take patients for{health centre}apointments to Williton. {A parish emergency committee}that holds a register of doctors, nurses, private generators, citizens band radio, fuel tanks etc. who would in case of heavy flooding, heavy snow or wartime emergency be able to assist on a local level.
